speaker: SPEED
text:
Lance
              ,
               
              by

              ,

              to
               
              Padua
              .

text:
Forswear
               
              not

              ,

              ,
               
              for
               
              I
               
              am
               
              not

              .
               
              I

              this
               
              always
              :
               
              that
               
              a

              is
               
              never

              till
               
              he
               
              be

              ,
               
              nor

              to
               
              a
              
              place
               
              till
               
              some

              shot
               
              be
               
              paid
               
              and
               
              the

              say
               
              welcome
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
Come
               
              on
              ,
               
              you
               
              madcap
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              to
               
              the

              with
              
              you
               
              presently
              ,
               
              where
              ,
               
              for
               
              one

              of
               
              five
               
              pence
              ,
              
              thou
               
              shalt
               
              have
               
              five
               
              thousand
               
              welcomes
              .
               
              But
              ,
               
              sirrah
              ,
              
              how
               
              did
               
              thy
               
              master
               
              part
               
              with
               
              Madam
               
              Julia
              ?

speaker: LANCE
text:
Marry
              ,
               
              after
               
              they
               
              closed
               
              in
               
              earnest
              ,
               
              they
               
              parted
              
              very
               
              fairly
               
              in
               
              jest
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
But
               
              shall
               
              she
               
              marry
               
              him
              ?

speaker: LANCE
text:
No
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
How
               
              then
              ?
               
              Shall
               
              he
               
              marry
               
              her
              ?

speaker: LANCE
text:
No
              ,
               
              neither
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
What
              ,
               
              are
               
              they
               
              broken
              ?

speaker: LANCE
text:
No
              ,
               
              they
               
              are
               
              both
               
              as
               
              whole
               
              as
               
              a
               
              fish
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
Why
               
              then
              ,
               
              how
               
              stands
               
              the
               
              matter
               
              with
               
              them
              ?

speaker: LANCE
text:
Marry
              ,
               
              thus
              :
               
              when
               
              it

              well
               
              with
               
              him
              ,
               
              it
              
              stands
               
              well
               
              with
               
              her
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
What
               
              an

              thou
              !

              thee

              .

speaker: LANCE
text:

              a
               
              block

              thou

              not
              !
               
              My

              me
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
What
               
              thou
               
              sayst
              ?

speaker: LANCE
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              and
               
              what
               
              I
               
              do
               
              too
              .

              thee
              ,
               
              I’ll
               
              but
               
              lean
              ,
              
              and
               
              my
               
              staff
               
              understands
               
              me
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
It

              ,

              ”

speaker: SPEED
text:
But

              ,

              a

              ?

text:

              my

              .

              ,
              ”
               
              it

              ;
               
              if

              ”

              ;
               
              if

              his

              and

              ,
               
              it

              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
The
               
              conclusion
               
              is
              ,
               
              then
              ,
               
              that
               
              it
               
              will
              .

speaker: LANCE
text:
Thou
               
              shalt
               
              never
               
              get
               
              such
               
              a
               
              secret
               
              from
               
              me
               
              but
              
              by
               
              a
               
              parable
              .

speaker: SPEED
text:
’Tis
               
              well

              so
              .

              ,

              ,

text:

              notable

              as

text:

              ,

              ,

              ,

              ,

Why
              ?
